700968f-a.text:
Eastchester Road, south from Boston Road (left), to a point midway between Tillotson and Givan Aves. The two houses, in the center of the view, bear Nos. 3352 and 3350 (left to right). The view is in an easterly
direction from Corsa Ave.
November 11, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
700968f-a.folder: Eastchester Road & Boston Road, Bronx, NY

700969f-a.text:
Eastchester Road (on which houses are facing), adjoining (empty lot, right) and north of the N.E. corner of Boston Road. The 2.5-story frame house in the center of the view bears No. 3442. Adjoining it to the north is Engine 38 and Hook and Ladder 51 of the New York Fire Department.
The vantage point is Corsa Ave.
November 11, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
700969f-a.folder: Eastchester Road & Boston Road, Bronx, NY

700970f-a.text:
Eastchester Road, north from and including Boston Road, showing the
thoroughfare in the process of construction.
November 11, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
700970f-a.folder: Eastchester Road & Boston Road, Bronx, NY

700549f-b.text:
(1)
3501 Boston Road, at the N.E. corner of Eastchester Road. The inscription on the house reads: Bronx Reed and Rattan Co. The view is south from Corsa Avenue.
November 11, 1932
P.L.Sperr
(2)
The same house, at a later date.
June 16, 1938
P.L.Sperr
700549f-b.folder: Boston Road & Eastchester Road, Bronx, NY

700550f-a.text:
Boston Road, south side, between Eastchester Road and Mickle
Avenue.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
